items.sentence: When angry, count to four. When very angry, swear.
It was hard for me to get out of bed this morning.
It was not until the next day that they found her.
It was raining heavily when I got up this morning.
It was raining when I got on the bus this morning.
Tom certainly has some pretty old-fashioned ideas.
Tom certainly needs your help much more than I do.
Tom circled the block looking for a place to park.
Tom claimed that he had not eaten for three weeks.
Have you already decided what you\'re going to do?
